content.description: Start over the makeshift wool sleeping mat (dark rock slight light overhung on the South East side. Start on low feet and use the the side left side crimp and right mini jug. Work up to match the slopping juge and reach for the upper right slipper on the orange left upward running bulge. Keep working feet up from there and top out to the left on so easy holds but sketch due to height. Can also work out from the upper holds to the left side upper slab and cross the arete which has lots of holds but check them first. Definitely want a couple of pads and spotter. Someone has to have FA this many years ago but can’t find any route details. Named after the wool improvised sleeping pad that we have seen both times we been here.
content.location: Big Boulder about 25’ in the middle of the meadow between both jade beach trails. Look for dark lichen free side of rock on the south side.
